page.title: 13A DAY IN THE LIFE OF BECKY
page.content: Becky Dingle is 10 years old and gets up around 7:50.She gets herself dressed and has a breakfast of toast and coffee at 8:00.Her mum takes her to school in the car.Her first lesson is English,where her mum is the teacher.10:40 is break.At 11:00 it is Maths with Mr.Blatchford, the headmaster.Dinner is at 12:30 and school starts again at 1:20.All afternoon is either swimming at{ {Launceston Leisure Centre}or art and craft.School finishes at 3:20 and she goes home with her mum.When she gets home she watches the{television}for a while,tea is at 7:00.On Tuesdays she goes to a{Surf Club Demonstration. } On Wednesdays she goes to{Guides.}Any other days she plays around the house or goes to the beach if it's warm.She goes to bed at 10:00.
